name: Another Castle (bpErron)
description:
You are a princess, trapped in another castle Controls:
  • move left and right with a/d or arrow keys
  • press space to jump
  • press E to interact
  • press Up + E to use special items
  • press S or down-arrow to "Sneak" which makes your harder to hear
OUR WORK IN PROGRESS ^^

Made with

Original Art made with

We will continue to work on this, adding more features, fixing bugs, adding story and replacing all art with more sophisticated original work.

Please, leave a comment. Let us know your gripes

Check the Dev Log in the future
